title: Professional Music Engraving
description: Transform your compositions into publication-ready scores with our expert engraving services.
content_html:
Professional Music Engraving

Transform your musical ideas into pristine, publication-ready scores. Our expert engraving services combine traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to deliver scores that meet the highest industry standards.

What We Offer

  • ‚úì
    Full Score Preparation: Complete orchestral and chamber music scores
  • ‚úì
    Individual Parts: Professional part extraction and formatting
  • ‚úì
    Lead Sheets: Jazz and contemporary music notation
  • ‚úì
    Vocal Scores: Piano-vocal arrangements and reductions

Our Process

1
Consultation: We discuss your project requirements and timeline
2
Analysis: Careful review of your manuscript or audio files
3
Engraving: Professional notation using industry-standard software
4
Review: Multiple rounds of proofreading and revision

"ZSCORE's attention to detail is unmatched. Every dynamic, every articulation, every beam and slur is precisely where it needs to be. Their scores don't just look beautiful‚Äîthey serve the music."

‚Äî Maria Santos, Principal Violinist, Metropolitan Orchestra

üéº Industry Standards

All our work follows the conventions established by major publishers like Henle, B√§renreiter, and G. Schirmer. Your scores will meet the expectations of performers, conductors, and publishers worldwide.

title: Workflow Automation & Custom Tools
description: Custom software tools, plugins, and scripts that streamline your workflow and reduce repetitive tasks.
content_html:
Workflow Automation & Custom Tools

Eliminate repetitive tasks and accelerate your creative process with our custom automation solutions. We develop specialized tools, plugins, and scripts that integrate seamlessly with your existing workflow.

Custom Sibelius plugin interface developed for IMPACT Opera

Sibelius Plugins

Custom plugins for automated formatting, part extraction, and notation standardization

Batch Processing

Scripts for processing multiple scores simultaneously with consistent formatting

Custom Solutions

Bespoke tools designed specifically for your unique workflow requirements

Recent Success Story

For the IMPACT Opera project, we developed a comprehensive Sibelius plugin that:

  • ‚óè Reduced part generation time by 75%
  • ‚óè Automated complex formatting for 80+ individual parts
  • ‚óè Eliminated manual errors through intelligent consistency checking
  • ‚óè Enabled real-time updates across all materials

The plugin is now part of our standard toolkit, benefiting all subsequent projects.

Available Tools & Services

Notation Software Plugins

Custom plugins for Sibelius, Finale, Dorico, and MuseScore

File Processing Scripts

Automated file conversion, renaming, and organization tools

Quality Assurance Tools

Automated checking for common notation errors and inconsistencies

Template Systems

Standardized templates for different ensemble sizes and publishers

Transform Your Workflow

Let us analyze your current process and identify opportunities for automation.
